text.section: The Commissioner shall designate correctional officers employed in each correctional facility in the Division who have the power to make arrests under § 2-207 of the Criminal Procedure Article.

A correctional officer who is authorized to make arrests under § 2-207 of the Criminal Procedure Article shall:
meet the minimum qualifications required by the Maryland Police Training Commission; and
complete satisfactorily the training prescribed by the Maryland Police Training Commission.
